hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Deku Shield# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Jail Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Barinade#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Serenade of Water# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: This hint is in another castle.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Goron City#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
